title: Green Beans with Green Sauce
introduction: Enjoy a delightful combination of tender green beans coated in a vibrant green sauce. Perfect as a side dish, these beans can be enhanced with boiled new potatoes and pair beautifully with grilled salmon or tuna steaks.
instructions: Prepare the green sauce, if necessary. Then, snap off the stem ends of the green beans. Bring about 2 quarts of water to a boil in a large saucepan. Add the beans and salt to taste. Cook uncovered until the beans are tender, 5 to 6 minutes.
Drain the beans well and pat them dry. Toss with the sauce. Serve warm or at room temperature.
variations: Add boiled new potatoes to the green beans for added texture and flavor.
